string-array.name: safety_tips
string-array.item: Stay alert and pay attention to the people and things around you, especially in unfamiliar or dimly lit areas.
If something feels off, it probably is. Don\'t hesitate to leave a situation that makes you uncomfortable or unsafe.
Stick to well-lit streets and pathways when walking alone at night.
Make sure your phone is charged and easily accessible in case of an emergency.
Let a trusted friend or family member know your plans and share your location with them.
Don\'t share personal information or location on social media, and be wary of friend requests or messages from strangers.
Consider carrying pepper spray or another form of self-defense tool with you.
Whenever possible, walk or travel with a friend or in a group.
Never leave your drink unattended, and be wary of accepting drinks from strangers.
If you feel unsafe or need help, reach out to a trusted friend or family member, or call emergency services.
